Description: Rim sherd of Attic black figured pottery skyphos or top-band stemless cup; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: black band on top of rim; below, black-figure decoration consisting of possibly male head with added red hair to left; undetermined motifs at left of figure and behind his head.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Ashmolean Museum, Oxford. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0352) (Phase 1)
Previous owner: Currently owned by: Ashmolean Museum, University of Oxford
